tool_description: Validates payment method details including card numbers, bank account information, and digital wallet tokens.

payment_type.description: Type of payment method (card, bank_account, digital_wallet)

payment_details.description: Encrypted or tokenized payment method details

error_messages: Invalid payment type: Payment type must be card, bank_account, or digital_wallet
Validation failed: Payment method details failed validation checks
Expired payment method: Payment method has expired
Unsupported validation level: Validation level must be basic, standard, or comprehensive
Decryption error: Unable to decrypt payment method details
usage: Provide payment_type and encrypted payment_details for validation. Adjust validation_level based on required security depth.

payment_method_type.description: Detected payment method subtype (e.g., visa, checking_account)
